entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 21 except 12 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thundershower late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 21 except 12 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023
